title: Forces - the interatomic nature of contact forces

content.prompt: A student pushes a box across a rough horizontal surface. Which of the following includes all the forces exerted on the box that are a result of interatomic electric forces?

choices.label: The force of friction and the normal force
The force of friction, the normal force, and the force exerted by the student
The force of friction, the normal force, the force exerted by the student, and the weight of the box

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
